items.name: static let both: CAScrollLayerScrollMode
items.desc: The receiver is able to scroll both horizontally and vertically.

items.name: static let horizontally: CAScrollLayerScrollMode
items.desc: The receiver is able to scroll horizontally.

items.name: static let none: CAScrollLayerScrollMode
items.desc: The receiver is unable to scroll.

items.name: static let vertically: CAScrollLayerScrollMode
items.desc: The receiver is able to scroll vertically.
